original_text: When all the Israelites who had hidden in the hill country of Ephraim heard that the Philistines were on the run, they joined the battle in hot pursuit.
korean_text: 에브라임 산지에 숨었던 이스라엘 모든 사람도 블레셋 사람들이 도망함을 듣고 싸우러 나와서 그들을 추격하였더라

sentences.original_text: who had hidden in the hill country of Ephraim
heard that the Philistines were on the run
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들이 도망하고 있다는 소식을 듣자
